text: Shirley Deane (born Shirley Deane Blattenberger; March 16, 1913 â€“ April 26, 1983) was an American actress. Her parents were Jesse H. Blattenberger and Zola Blattenberger (unmarried name Redden). Deane's maternal grandmother raised her. She was best known as an actress for playing "Bonnie Jones" in 20th Century Fox's Jones Family series of movies.Tucker p. 61 ==Movies== * The First Baby (1936) * Charlie Chan at the Circus (1936) * King of Burlesque (1936) * Educating Father (1936) * Off to the Races (1937) * Nancy Steele Is Missing! (1937) * The Jones Family in Big Business (1937) * Hot Water (1937) * Undercover Agent (1939) * Flash Gordon Conquers the Universe (1940) ==References== ==Bibliography== * Tucker, David C. The Women Who Made Television Funny: Ten Stars of 1950s Sitcoms. McFarland, 2015. ==Other websites== * Category:1913 births Category:1983 deaths Category:American movie actors
title: Shirley Deane
